title: Episode 207: Scorpion Lashes w/ Erik Griffin
itunes:title: Episode 207: Scorpion Lashes w/ Erik Griffin
description:
Guest host Erik is a falcon wrangler. Khalyla has a three-year grudge. Bobby is a church boy. We talk half-face first dates, tamale eating, & Tom Cruise noses.
